events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on April 29th, requesting to file a new auto insurance claim.
Claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the description mentioning a car collision and damages.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer's case regarding the car accident damages.
We officially acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the investigation will begin promptly.
Request sent to the customer asking for the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and witness statements.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and several photos of the damaged car.
The investigation into the cause and extent of the auto accident damages officially commenced today.
Investigation completed with full assessment of damages and liability determination based on gathered evidence.
A settlement offer was proposed covering repair costs and additional compensation for the vehicle accident.
Customer responded expressing satisfaction with the prompt handling and the proposed settlement offer.
The claim was officially approved by the claims department following acceptance of the settlement proposal.
Payment was issued to the customer to cover the vehicle repairs as per the approved claim settlement.
The claim file was closed after confirmation that payment was received and repairs completed satisfactorily.
All case documents and communications were archived for future reference and compliance auditing.
